weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the sun bathes the city in a gentle warmth, illuminating neighborhood streets with a soft glow, perfect for a leisurely stroll. The temperature hovers comfortably around 63 degrees, tapering into the afternoon air as the breeze meanders in from the northwest at a gentle six miles per hour. With the absence of fog, visibility is exceptional, revealing the majestic contours of the Golden Gate Bridge to the north and the inviting horizon of the Bay to the east. The skies are predominantly clear, dotted with a few wispy clouds that dance lazily against the vast blue backdrop, hinting at a pleasant tranquility.

As the day eases toward evening, the weather remains congenial, with a low settling around 49 degrees tonight. Dress in layers to embrace the transition from the sunny warmth of the day to the cooler night air; a light jacket or sweater will suffice. This is an ideal day for enjoying the city—perhaps take a walk through the Presidio’s scenic trails, visit a local café for a warm beverage, or meander along the waterfront to soak in the serene beauty of the bay. In this moment, San Francisco invites you to slow down and enjoy the simple pleasures of life against a stunning backdrop.
